Uses of Package
rt

  • Packages that use rt 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.basicscenes
    Implementations of the abstract class Scene.
    rt.cameras
    Implementations of the Camera interface.
    rt.films
    Implementations of the Film interface.
    rt.integrators
    Implementations of the Integrator interface.
    rt.intersectables
    Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
    rt.lightsources
    Implementations of the LightGeometry interface.
    rt.materials
    Implementations of the Material interface.
    rt.samplers
    Implementations of the Sampler interface.
    rt.testscenes
    Simple test scenes to compare your renderer to a reference solution.
    rt.tonemappers
    Implementations of the Tonemapper interface.
  • Classes in rt used by rt 
    Class and Description
    Camera
    Given the specification of a ray in image space, a camera constructs a corresponding ray in world space.
    Film
    A film stores a 2D grid of Spectrum representing an image.
    HitRecord
    Stores information about a ray-surface intersection.
    Integrator
    An integrator takes a ray starting at the camera and evaluates its contribution to the image.
    IntegratorFactory
    Makes an Integrator.
    Intersectable
    An intersectable supports ray-surface intersection.
    LightList
    A list of light sources.
    Material
    Materials implement functionality for shading surfaces using their BRDFs.
    Material.ShadingSample
    Stores information about a shading sample.
    Ray
    A ray represented by an origin and a direction.
    Sampler
    Makes random samples, which are used for Monte Carlo rendering.
    SamplerFactory
    Makes a Sampler.
    Scene
    Defines scene properties that need to be made accessible to the renderer.
    Spectrum
    Stores a spectrum of color values.
    Tonemapper
    Compresses a raw rendered Film to an image that can be displayed on typical 8-bit displays.
  • Classes in rt used by rt.basicscenes 
    Class and Description
    Scene
    Defines scene properties that need to be made accessible to the renderer.
